messages.subject: Viz Caya
messages.msgSnippet: LOL! I know what you mean, we really enjoyed the Viz Caya.  It was so beautiful, and being on the grounds of the estate made it even more so.  The boys sat,
messages.messageBody:
LOL!
I know what you mean, we really enjoyed the Viz Caya. It was so beautiful,
and being on the grounds of the estate made it even more so. The boys sat,
SAT for 3 hours watching all the dramatics. They bring people over from
Italy to do this. Really neat, we had even thought about becoming members of
the Miami Renaissance Society, but it would just involve to much night time
activity in Miami, and we don't go there!!! LOL I think the site I sent
shows some of the grounds, not sure, but you would love it, it is right on
the water, with docks and patio running down to and into the water. Gorgeous!
Teresa
